text: BTX may refer to: * Bildschirmtext, an interactive videotex system launched in 1983 in West Germany * BTX (chemistry), a mixture of benzene, toluene and xylenes * B't X, a science fiction manga and anime television series created by Masami Kurumada * BTX (boot loader), the standard boot loader for FreeBSD * BTX (form factor), a form factor for PC motherboards * Backstreets Magazine, also known as BTX, a popular Internet forum for fans of musician Bruce Springsteen * Batrachotoxin, a neurotoxic poison that blocks sodium channels * Botulinum toxin, the most potent neurotoxin known
title: BTX
